desc: We offer women’s clothing & accessories. We stock sizes XS-3XL. We have casual wear for running errands & coffee outings with the girls. We have business attire and all essentials you’ll need for your closet. Our name may have boutique in it, but you'll never pay those “boutiquey” prices.
